answer: Once you finish all modules in any given Learning Programme, you get awarded a Certificate 🙌  When you download the Certificate you can Select the language the PDF will be exported to 🌎
answer_formatted: Once you finish all modules in any given Learning Programme, you get awarded a Certificate 🙌  When you download the Certificate you can Select the language the PDF will be exported to 🌎
question: How do I change the language of my Certificate?
